Name: Commander Farsight
Unit_Composition: 1 Commander Farsight - Epic Hero;This model is equipped with: high-intensity plasma rifle; Dawn Blade.

Abilities.Way of the Short Blade: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll.
Abilities.Puretide's Teachings: Once per battle round, you can target this model's unit with a Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.

Leader: This model can be attached to the following units:; Crisis Sunforge Battlesuits;Crisis Fireknife Battlesuits;Crisis Starsycht Battlesuits
Independent Power: If your army includes Commander Farsight, it cannot inclue any Ethereal units. If you army includes any Ethereal units, it connat include Commander Farsight.
